adjective.description: Resisting an attack made on someone or something; protecting from harm or danger.
examples: the defending forces were met by a wall of enemy gunfire

adjective.description: Conducting the case for the party being accused or sued in a lawsuit.
examples: the defending lawyer pleaded for acquittal

adjective.description: (in sports) protecting one's goal rather than attempting to score against one's opponents.
examples: a free kick awarded to the defending team in their own penalty area
